net.nologin.meep.tbv

Class TileRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileRange

  • public class TileRange
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the range of tile IDs that make up the tile grid. Immutable.

        Create a Tile range by specifying the boundary IDs
        Parameters:
        left - The leftmost ID
        top - The topmost ID
        right - The rightmost ID
        bottom - The leftmost ID

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int x,
               int y,
               int rangePadding)
        Determine whether the supplied (x,y) tile coordinates lie within this range.
        Parameters:
        x - The x tile coordinate
        y - The y tile coordinate
        rangePadding - This range will be increased in all directions by this amount before checking (x,y). Negative values are treated as 0.
        Returns:
        true if the range contains (x,y), false otherwise.

      • numTilesHorizontal

        public int numTilesHorizontal()
        Returns:
        The width of this range, in tiles.

      • numTilesVertical

        public int numTilesVertical()
        Returns:
        The height of this range, in tiles.

      • numTiles

        public int numTiles()
        Returns:
        The number of tiles that make up this range (tiles wide * tiles high)
